text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Ever since I officially became Nice<n>Nature's trainer, we've
been training<n>day in, day out.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Whew, my arms and legs are all<n>wobbly! Guess that's a
personalized<n>training menu for you—no punches<n>held.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I'm definitely feeling this in the<n>morning... But what's next?
Whatcha<n>got prepared?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
In stark contrast to her usual aloof<n>demeanor, Nice Nature is
diligent and<n>eager when it comes to training.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hm? Cat got your tongue, Trainer?
choice_data_list:
I was just thinking about what a nice and
hard-working student you are.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?! N-nah, it's like... I gotta do whatI gotta do, you know? For what it'sworth, I am a Tracen student.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, stop with the sappy stuff and<n>tell me what I gotta
do next.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After training like this for a while, our<n>first challenge comes
in the form of a<n>scrimmage against other students.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Third again...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Even with my own personal trainer,<n>even after that much
training—third is<n>all I got in me, huh.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haha, looks like third place is where I<n>belong, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Goals like staying undefeated or<n>conquering the Twinkle<n>
Series—they're not meant for me.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
No way, what're you even saying? I<n>told you when we first
met,<n>remember? I haven't got any talent<n>worth writing
home about.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I'll still do all the training, and I'll<n>obviously try my best to
win the races<n>you sign me up for.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But I understand myself all too well.<n>My talents as a racer,
and my limits<n>too.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Okay, that's enough out of me! Look,<n>I think it's time for me
to head o—

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Rumble...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh? Was that you, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Haha, don't sweat it! A growing<n>youngster's gotta eat,
after all.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I've got it—come with me for a sec!<n>There's a great place I
know.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm pretty sure I'm older than Nature,<n>but before I can blurt
out a witty retort,<n>she grabs my arm and drags me<n>away...

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Mmm, smells good! Hey pops, you<n>got any fresh meatball
skewers?

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
Oh, it's Natie! We got meatball<n>skewers all right—gizzard,
too!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Oh, sounds great! Then maybe I'll<n>take one—wait, no. It's
not just me<n>today!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I want my trainer to try the food here.<n>Could you whip up
some of your<n>specialities for me?

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
No problem, comin' right up—wait,<n>whaaat?! You're Natie's
trainer?! Yer<n>not pulling my leg, are ya?!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Ah, crud...

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
How rude of me! Trainer, wait right<n>there! I'm gon' get the
best food this<n>here shopping district has to offer!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Uh, you don't gotta—aaand he's<n>gone. Dang, he's fast. You
think he'd<n>run my races for me?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Yeesh, I knew this would happen, so I<n>was trying to avoid
saying you were<n>my trainer. Man, that was a bust.
choice_data_list:
The people of the shopping district really love
you.

The people of the shopping district really love
you.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Well, you could say that... I mean,<n>even at Tracen Academy,
I try to be<n>the girl everyone feels comfortable<n>talking to,
y'know?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Back home, I lived in a shopping<n>district just like this one.
My mom ran<n>a little bar there, so I've been helping<n>out
since I was a kid.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Cause of that, I've talked to my fair<n>share of grown-ups in
my time, from<n>regulars at the bar to other shopping<n>district
denizens.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: That's probably why people tell me I<n>act old for my age.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But it's also why I was able to meet<n>so many friendly old
folk, so all in all,<n>I'm pretty grateful.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Which reminds me, I wonder how the<n>lady who ran the
sweets shop back<n>home is doing? Hope her back isn't<n>
bothering her too much.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
She's got a scary face, but she's<n>actually really nice. When
I was little,<n>she'd always give me leftover candy<n>from the
shop.
choice_data_list: The folks back home must love you too.
The folks back home must love you too.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Haha... Despite that, I've got no real<n>talents worth writing
home about.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: In reality... everyone was just being<n>nice.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
I was a little bit faster than the local<n>competition, so they
cheered me on<n>and hyped me up. And look, it got me<n>all
the way here.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
You should've been there the day I<n>left home. They put up
flags and<n>streamers all over the shopping<n>district. Said it
was a festival.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
But now... just look at me—look at<n>what I did with all those
lofty<n>expectations.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: All I can get are decent results,like—

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, Trainer—sorry 'bout the wait!<n>Eat this and fill yerself
right up! We're<n>leavin' Natie in yer capable hands!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
Haha... You heard him, Trainer. Better<n>eat up before it gets
cold, 'kay?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text: Ah, you're here! Heeey, Nature!<n>Whew, I finally found you!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hm, Teio? What's the matter?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Haven't you seen the race<n>program? They put it up
already, you<n>know—for the Meet!

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
Oh, the legendary Tracen Meet! Tons<n>of people come to
watch every year. I<n>can't wait!

text_block_list.name: Friendly Man
text_block_list.text:
And don't you worry, Natie, all of us<n>are comin' to cheer
you on!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Haha, I 'preciate it. I really do. Butwow, I didn't think they'd have theprogram up this fast.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text:
More importantly... Teio, you came all<n>the way here just to
tell me that?

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
Heh-heh, you signed up for the<n>2000m turf race, right? Well,
I did too!

text_block_list.name: Tokai Teio
text_block_list.text:
We got put in the same group! So I'm<n>here to declare war!
Nature—it's you<n>against me!

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: I-I'm racing... against you?!
